item.title: CVE-2020-3935|2024-08-04T07:52:20.499Z -- taiwan%20secom%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- door%20access%20control%20system
item.description: TAIWAN SECOM CO., LTD., a Door Access Control and Personnel Attendance Management system, stores usersâ€™ information by cleartext in the cookie, which divulges password to attackers.

item.title: CVE-2020-3933|2024-08-04T07:52:19.803Z -- taiwan%20secom%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- door%20access%20control%20system
item.description: TAIWAN SECOM CO., LTD., a Door Access Control and Personnel Attendance Management system, allows attackers to enumerate and exam user account in the system.

item.title: CVE-2020-3934|2024-08-04T07:52:20.538Z -- taiwan%20secom%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- door%20access%20control%20system
item.description: TAIWAN SECOM CO., LTD., a Door Access Control and Personnel Attendance Management system, contains a vulnerability of Pre-auth SQL Injection, allowing attackers to inject a specific SQL command.
